articles.title: “AI is in a Bubble:” OpenAI CEO Sam Altman compares AI hype to the Dot-Com crash
articles.summary: Even as OpenAI edges toward a staggering $500 billion valuation, Sam Altman is warning that the artificial intelligence boom may be overheating. Speaking with reporters last week, the OpenAI CEO didn’t shy away from calling it what many in Silicon Valley whisper about: a bubble. In an interview with The Verge published Friday, Altman said,

articles.title: Nearly 90% of videogame developers use AI agents, Google study shows
articles.summary: A Google Cloud survey showed that 87% of videogame developers are using artificial intelligence agents to streamline and automate tasks, as the industry focuses on optimizing costs following a wave of record layoffs.
articles.translated_title: Nearly 90% of videogame developers use AI agents, Google study shows

articles.summary: McGraw Hill is set up to be a strong artificial intelligence beneficiary, Deutsche Bank said.

articles.title: Trump's AI plan is a bulwark against the rising threat from China
articles.summary: Trump's AI initiative aims to maintain American leadership in artificial intelligence amid growing competition with China and national security concerns

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg Reportedly Plans Fourth AI Restructuring In Six Months Amid Silicon Valley's AI Talent War
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ: META) is reportedly gearing up for its fourth major overhaul of artificial intelligence (AI) initiatives in just six months.

articles.title: Editorial: Artificial intelligence meets fried chicken at Wingstop
articles.summary: Wingstop’s new digital operating system streamlines ordering and evaluates scads of data to predict how much food will be needed and when.

articles.title: Self-checkout has impact at Fenway, TD Garden
articles.summary: Checkout machines powered by artificial intelligence have increased sales at Fenway Park and TD Garden, but have left workers feeling unfulfilled and underpaid.
articles.translated_title: Self-checkout has impact at Fenway, TD Garden

articles.title: Top tech leaders battling for AI supremacy - while spending billions and slinging mud along the way
articles.summary: With artificial intelligence promising to impact the way the world things, the smartest people in tech are hustling to to come up with the best and brightest version that they can control.

articles.title: ‘An existential threat’: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs
articles.summary: If there’s one thing the White House, Wall Street and Silicon Valley can agree on, it’s that artificial intelligence is a top priority.
articles.translated_title: ‘An existential threat’: For Silicon Valley, falling behind in AI is a bigger threat than tariffs

articles.title: OpenAI's Sam Altman says AI market is in a bubble
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman thinks the artificial intelligence market is in a bubble, similar to the dotcom bubble, he recently told reporters.
